title: Remove hardcoded secrets and use environment variables
description: Security: Hardcoded secrets in source code must be removed. (1) server/proxy.js line 28: YOUTRACK_TOKEN hardcoded—use process.env.YOUTRACK_TOKEN. (2) src/services/youtrack.ts line 79: Remove fallback YouTrack token from client bundle—use VITE_YOUTRACK_TOKEN only or ensure proxy is always used. (3) server/production-server.js and server/proxy.js: METABASE_API_KEY hardcoded—use process.env.METABASE_API_KEY. All secrets must come from env vars only.

title: Investigate and fix large chunk size warning (index.js ~1.2MB)
description: Vite build warns: main chunk (index-Dtjx9hvD.js) is 1,203.64 kB, exceeding 500 kB limit. Consider: dynamic import() for code-splitting, build.rollupOptions.output.manualChunks, or adjust build.chunkSizeWarningLimit. Investigate and implement improvements.

title: Smoother interaction transitions
description: From UI QA Report: Buttons have good hover states, but mobile sidebar transitions could be smoother with better easing.

title: Design system and theme consistency
description: From UI QA Report: (1) Move hardcoded chart colors from index.tsx useMemo to central theme (e.g. src/config/chart-theme.ts). (2) Replace global.css body bg-slate-100 with breeze-50/breeze-100 from design system. (3) Unify design system variables—replace default Tailwind colors (slate, blue, green) with custom ocean, breeze, accent scales. (4) Remove hardcoded hex values from page components.

title: Completed projects on home page shows 0 - include Archive state with Done
description: Completed projects count on the home page shows 0. The true count requires including both 'Archive' and 'Done' states when filtering for completed projects. Currently only 'Done' is considered.

title: Consolidate duplicate proxy and production-server logic
description: YouTrack proxy, Metabase inspect, and metrics endpoints duplicated between server/proxy.js and server/production-server.js. Extract shared logic into reusable modules to reduce maintenance burden and drift.

title: Replace TypeScript any with proper types
description: Codebase guidelines prohibit 'any'. Replace in: youtrack.ts (payload, result.data casts, transformIssueToTicket return), tools.tsx (inspectorResult, reportData, project casts), request.tsx (item, response.data), testYouTrack.ts (task.tags, window). Add proper interfaces.

title: Sidebar typography contrast for accessibility
description: From UI QA Report: Ensure text-white/70 in sidebar has sufficient contrast against bg-slate-900. Consider increasing to text-white/80 or text-white/90 for inactive states.

title: Evaluate and migrate frontend from Gatsby to Vite + React
description: Current build uses Gatsby but all data is fetched at runtime—Gatsby's static/GraphQL benefits are unused. Migrate to Vite + React for simpler builds, faster dev experience, and better fit for this dashboard app. Also fix pathPrefix for Render deployment (use GATSBY_PATH_PREFIX=/ for root).

title: Max fetch for YouTrack project issues capped at 100
description: The max fetch limit for YouTrack project issues appears to be hardcoded or capped at 100, but this is not the correct value. Need to investigate and fix the limit.

title: Header and navigation consolidation
description: From UI QA Report: (1) Mobile header uses solid bg-ocean-600—apply glassmorphism (backdrop-blur, transparency) to match sidebar. (2) Layout.tsx and Header.tsx have overlapping nav logic—refactor into unified Shell component with shared logic across breakpoints. (3) Apply glass-card/nav-glass styling to mobile header for visual continuity.

title: Reduce or remove console.log in production
description: Excessive console.log in youtrack.ts, request.tsx, proxy.js, production-server.js logs URLs, request bodies, response data—can leak sensitive info and add noise. Implement proper logging levels or remove debug logs for production.

title: Address TEMPORARY getDoneAutomationTasksCount
description: youtrack.ts getDoneAutomationTasksCount() has TEMPORARY comment. Either formalize as a proper feature or remove if no longer needed.
